message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor.  It's fair, considering I'm the one coming up with the ideas here!
I think this is a fair split, considering we're working together as a team. I'm willing to compromise and give you a decent amount, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 55, you take 45.  We can both be happy with that.
